DOC.brief_title: A Study TAS-114 Combination With S-1 Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: This phase 1 , open-label , non-randomized , dose-escalating safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetic study TAS-114 combination S-1 patient advance solid tumor .
